document.full_text: planned parenthood filed a lawsuit in federal court seeking to block a south dakota law that would require women seeking abortions to face the nation's longest waiting period and undergo counseling.
document.title: plains: south dakota: suit challenges abortion restrictions
lines_and_colors: planned parenthood filed a lawsuit in federal court seeking to block a south dakota law that would require women seeking abortions to face the nation's longest waiting period and undergo counseling.
